jobs.name: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: As a senior full-stack developer at Faith you will be pioneering development efforts on our flagship mobile application. As a natural leader of the team, others will seek you out for questions. This most likely isnâ€™t your first time creating scalable, maintainable software. Writing unit and integration tests must be second nature. If you seek a challenging opportunity with ample opportunity for career development while working from home, this is it!
skills: 5+ years experience writing full-stack applications preferred
Held full-time remote job in the past
Capable of writing unit and integration tests
Experience deploying to Apple App Store and Google Play Store

jobs.name: Cleaner Instructor
jobs.description: As a cleaner instructor at Faith you will be responsible for teaching new-hire cleaners everything they need to know about how to properly clean a home. Everything from the basics of cleaning, to customer service, and advanced time-saving techniques.

jobs.name: Product Manager
jobs.description: Our flagship mobile application needs a stellar product manager to facilitate a continuous feedback loop between our sponsors, clients, and in-house development team. You will be responsible for setting priority on features and maintaining a release schedule.
skills: Has held a remote job in the past
